conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a heist movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: If you're in the mood for a thrilling heist movie, I'd recommend "Takers" starring Matt Dillon, T.I., Chris Brown, and Paul Walker. The film follows a group of bank robbers whose multi-million dollar plan is interrupted by a hard-boiled detective. Another great choice would be "Snatch", a witty and action-packed heist film with an all-star cast including Jason Statham, Brad Pitt, and Guy Ritchie, which follows the search for a priceless stolen diamond. Enjoy!

conversation.text: If you're looking for a thrilling heist movie with an all-star cast, I'd highly recommend "Ocean's Thirteen". This film follows Danny Ocean and his team as they plan a complex heist against a casino owner who double-crossed one of their own. Or, if you prefer a more intense and character-driven heist story, "The Score" featuring Robert De Niro and Edward Norton might be just the ticket for you!

Another great choice is "Taxi Driver," directed by Martin Scorsese and featuring Robert De Niro in one of his iconic roles. It's a powerful story about a troubled taxi driver who gets caught up in the seedy underbelly of New York City, offering a gripping depiction of morality and redemption.

This film offers an insightful look into the life of one of America's most iconic presidents, with a focus on his transformation from a privileged politician to a leader during the Spanish-American War.

For a more modern take on adventure and self-discovery, "Wanderlust" (2012) might also appeal to you. This film follows a man who, after a financial crisis, embarks on a global journey to reconnect with his childhood dreams of exploration. The movie features an interesting ensemble cast including Paul Rudd, Jennifer Aniston, and Justin Theroux.
